title: IELTS Listening Part 1: Accommodation Enquiry
text: Listen to the conversation between a student and a landlord.

questions.prompt: What is the surname of the caller?
questions.explanation: The man spells his surname: H-A-R-T-I-N-G.

questions.prompt: How much is the rent per week?
questions.explanation: The landlord mentions the rent is £100 per week including water.

questions.prompt: When is the room available from?
questions.explanation: The room will be free from the beginning of September (1st).

questions.prompt: What is included in the rent?
questions.explanation: The landlord states that the rent includes 'water rates', but electricity is paid separately.

questions.prompt: The house is located near the __________.
questions.explanation: The landlord says the house is 'just around the corner from the Sports Centre'.
